message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you do $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can do $115, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do $112. Can you meet me at that price?
I think we're really close, Bob. I can meet you at $114, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I'm really close, but I think I can do $113. Can you meet me at that price?
